message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
I understand you want a larger share, but a 52.5/47.5 split seems more reasonable considering the future rounds and inflation.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but it's still not fair. I'm willing to compromise slightly at a 55/45 split.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is a compromise - slightly better for you than last round, but reflects the increasing pressure from inflation.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out because of our stubbornness. Meet me halfway at 52.5/47.5, and let's end this.
